messages.description: Usage message for the program. {0} is the program name.
messages.C:
Usage: {0} [-F sepstring] [-v assignment]... program [argument...]
       {0} [-F sepstring] -f progfile [-f progfile]... [-v assignment]... [argument...]
Abort: File system error whilst parsing '{0}'.

messages.description: We have an uncaught exception of type std::exception, {0} is the what.
We have an uncaught exception of unknown type.

messages.C: No program specified.  Either specify a file via '-f program', or as the first command-line argument.
